TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneSlabs
TerrainDef.description: Stone flooring made with unremarkable square slabs. Easy to build and functional.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneStaggered
TerrainDef.description: Stone tiles with rounded corners laid in a staggered pattern.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneRough
TerrainDef.description: Rough paving that can be built with very little stone, but it's plain to look at and relatively time-consuming to lay. Cannot be salvaged.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneAlternating
TerrainDef.description: Stone flooring with rounded bricks laid in a simple but pleasant alternating pattern. Slightly easier to build than other stone floors of similar quality.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneHerringbone
TerrainDef.description: Stone bricks laid in a stylish herringbone pattern.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneHex
TerrainDef.description: Stone paving with eye-catching interlocking hexagonal tiles.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneDigital
TerrainDef.description: Paving that cleverly uses two shapes of stone to create a vaguely digital pattern.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneMosaic
TerrainDef.description: Paved stone flooring in an attractive mosaic pattern. Slightly easier to build than other stone floors of similar quality.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneRandom
TerrainDef.description: Carefully-laid stone flooring with a rustic, random pattern of slabs. Needs fewer materials than a mosaic but harder to build.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneDiamond
TerrainDef.description: Intricate stone flooring cut around precisely-measured diamond spacer tiles. Fit for royalty.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneArabesque
TerrainDef.description: Mastercrafted stone flooring with tiles painstakingly shaped into an arabesque pattern. Fit for royalty.

TerrainDef.Name: FloorBaseStoneChequered
TerrainDef.description: Chequered stone slabs combining two types of stone together in a pleasing pattern. Slightly easier to build than other stone floors of similar quality.
